scripts.build:module: rollup -o module.js -f es -n picoDOM --banner "/* hugov@runbox.com | https://github.com/hville/pico-dom.git | license:MIT */" ./src/bundle.js
scripts.build:main: rollup -o index.js -f cjs --banner "/* hugov@runbox.com | https://github.com/hville/pico-dom.git | license:MIT */" ./src/bundle.js
scripts.build:browser: rollup -o browser.js -f iife -n picoDOM --banner "/* hugov@runbox.com | https://github.com/hville/pico-dom.git | license:MIT */" ./src/bundle.js
scripts.build:min: google-closure-compiler-js --compilationLevel ADVANCED --languageIn ES5 --languageOut ES5 --useTypesForOptimization true browser.js > browser.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build:main && npm run build:module && npm run build:browser && npm run build:min
